name: UI Trainer
description:
Replenishing the internal piggy bank of visual images is a good habit of any designer, regardless of specialization. Visual taste is a daily practice. So that there are no more excuses for training, I have prepared some exercises for improve your design skills.


All you have to do is go to the file, open a new task and do it. Tasks do not take more than 1-2 hours and are aimed at various aspects of design.
